settings.hero_subtitle: Industry-leading courses designed by experts for amusement industry professionals

settings.title: Course Details
settings.content:
This comprehensive safety education course provides in-depth training designed by industry experts with decades of practical experience in amusement park safety and operations.

  • Interactive online modules
  • Real-world case studies
  • Expert instructor support
  • Professional certification upon completion

settings.title: Learning Objectives
settings.content:
Upon completion of this course, participants will be able to:

  • Implement industry best practices and safety standards
  • Conduct effective safety inspections and assessments
  • Understand compliance requirements and regulations
  • Apply safety protocols in real-world scenarios
  • Manage safety documentation and reporting

settings.title: Taught by Industry Leaders
settings.content:
Our courses are developed and taught by recognized experts in amusement industry safety, including former IAAPA Safety Committee members, ASTM F24 Committee participants, and professionals with extensive operational experience.

All instructors hold advanced certifications and have contributed to the development of industry safety standards and best practices.
